#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(route_control)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} ${PROJECT_NAME}.cpp server.h)

find_package(roscpp REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${roscpp_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(GeoMath REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${GeoMath_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(sensor_msgs REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${sensor_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(juk_msg REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${juk_msg_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_library(PTHREAD_LIBRARY pthread)
 
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME}  /usr/local/lib/libGeoMath_lib.a ${PTHREAD_LIBRARY} ${roscpp_LIBRARIES} "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")

install(TARGETS ${PROJECT_NAME} DESTINATION bin)
